# layerWillDraw(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the delegate of an imminent draw.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func layerWillDraw(_ layer: CALayer)
```

## Parameters

- **layer**: The layer whose contents will be drawn.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerDelegate/layerWillDraw(_:)] method is called before [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerDelegate/draw(_:in:)]. You can use this method to configure any layer state affecting contents prior to [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerDelegate/draw(_:in:)] such as [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/contentsFormat] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/isOpaque].



## Providing the Layer’s Content

- **display(_:)**: Tells the delegate to implement the display process.
- **draw(_:in:)**: Tells the delegate to implement the display process using the layer’s context.
